main event: A falling star-like object was observed over Oslo, Norway on December 12, 1947.
interesting points: The object was described as unusually bright and traveled from right to left on a great arc,The observer noted the object had a greenish-yellow tail,It was seen for about two to three seconds before being obscured by trees,No noise or smell was reported during the sighting,The University Observatory had no record of this event, but a local employee reported a high number of falling stars observed the following night.
sighted object: a bright falling star-like object with a greenish-yellow tail
witness description: The 16-year-old daughter of an unidentified individual
